element.label: AbsoluteCVDRiskItem
element.definition: An assessment tool used to calculate the absolute cardiovascular disease risk (CVD) in the next 5 years.

element.label: TotalRiskScore
element.definition: The total risk score calculated from all component scores.

element.label: AUDITItem
element.short: Alcohol use disorders identification test item
element.definition: Ten question screening test to identify harmful alcohol consumption.
element.comment:
PREFACE: 
AUDIT-C is an assessment about alcohol consumption, focused on harmful, rather than typical, drinking behaviour. In Release 2, the Data Dictionary carries the Audit-C total score only. In future releases the parameters for AUDIT-C or the full AUDIT test can be added, if required.

element.label: AUDITCTotal
element.definition: Total Score calculated from the first 3 AUDIT questions only.
